channel.title: Mdb on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Mdb on TLDRBins

item.title: Microsoft Access Database
item.description: Tools mdbtools sudo apt install mdbtools Basic # Show all tables mdb-tables database.mdb # Show tables with data mdb-tables database.mdb | tr ' ' '\n' | grep . | while read table; do lines=$(mdb-export database.mdb $table | wc -l); if [ $lines -gt 1 ]; then echo "$table: $lines"; fi; done # Dump data from table mdb-export database.mdb <TABLE_NAME>
